        IncompleteClassInfoException

      • addReachableClasses

        public void addReachableClasses(java.lang.String initialClassName,
                                java.lang.String primaryPrefix)
                         throws IncompleteClassInfoException
        For determining the primary classes when you don't have a hard-coded class list, or knowledge of the file system where classes are stored. Determines the set of primary classes by walking the class reference graph out from the initial class name, and marking all classes which start with primaryPrefix.
        Throws:
        IncompleteClassInfoException
